nodes.text: Roche was a location in the galaxy's Mid Rim, in grid square Q-8 on the Standard Galactic Grid, situated between Lantillies and Abhean on the Perlemian Trade Route. It shared its name with the Verpine Roche Hive, a droid manufacturer. During the Clone Wars, a sneak attack on Roche occurred, a battle which the Dressellian smuggler Has Obitt was caught in the middle of.
